New Records: The Chicago Cubs recorded only one hit, a double by Cody Bellinger in the fourth inning.
Key Match Events: The New York Yankees won the game 3-0, their highest scoring game of the season.
Aaron Judge scored on an RBI double in the third inning.
Anthony Rizzo was welcomed back to Wrigley Field.
Pre-Game Insights: Fans, including those from the Anthony Rizzo Family Foundation, attended the game.
Anthony Rizzo received a warm welcome from both fans and teammates.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A fair amount of Yankees fans were present in the stands.
The game was notable for its low attendance and the Yankees' strong performance.
